availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. McIntyre (Boone County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, farmer. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Son Married to Mary Elizabeth Miller McIntyre in Boone County, Kentucky, on December 3, 1856. Father of Lucian McIntyre. Farm manager in Walton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Walton, p. 454.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Big Bone, p. 147B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boone County Marriages, Film #000216817.
Find A Grave, "Mary Elizabeth McIntyre (Oct. 19, 1837-Dec. 28, 1886)," Memorial #55018630, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/55018630 (accessed August 14, 2020).
